joke:
Q: What did Louis Braille send his wife in the mail?
A: Dots of love.

Q: How can blind people make eye contact?
A: By touching the eyes.

Q: What did the blind man say when he passed the fish market?
A: Good morning ladies.

Q: Why did the blind man fall down the well?
A: He couldn’t see that well.

Q: Why can’t blind people eat fish?
A: Because it’s sea food.

Q: What is the difference between a blind man and a sailor in prison?
A: One can’t see to go, the other can’t go to sea.

Q: Why don’t blind people skydive?
A: Because it scares their dogs too much.

Q: Why was a blind man’s leg wet?
A: The dog was blind too.

Q: What are blind children mostly afraid of at night?
A: The light.
Q: What did a blind boy’s parent’s do to punish him?A: Rearranged the furniture

Q: How did a blind man meet his wife?
A: On a blind date.

Q: Have you seen one of Stevie Wonder’s wifes?
A: Neither has he.

Q: Why are bats blind?
A: Well, you wouldn’t see too good if you hung upside-down all day, would you?

Q: Why do blind people like medicine so much?
A: Because it has sight effects.

Q: What is one good thing about being a blind teenager?
A: Knowing that your parents will never read your diary.

Q: What’s one way to distinguish a blind person from a sighted person?
A: Almost all blind people laugh at these blind jokes, while sighted people claim they’re offensive.

Q: How did a blind man drive his car?
A: One hand on the wheel; the other on the road.

Q: What’s the worst thing you could do to a blind person?
A: Leave the plunger in the toilet.
